attributes.action: commend Margaret Hodge for highlighting the immigrant housing issue
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Margaret Hodge Should be commended for highlighting this long ignored issue.

It is good to finally see someone in government realise that the native British population should have some rights as well.

Now lets see the government act on this and stop eroding all rights of the native population so that they can favour the immigrant population.
